strings.Value: "Does anyone wish to learn how to extract information from the dead? This is your last chance to get to know your companions better..."
"You know, I could... resurrect... your dead friends. So you wouldn't have to carry anyone..."
"To prolong life's emptiness, and breathe a semblance of life into the corpse of one who has finally found peace... This shows a lack of wisdom."
"I warn you, Jaethal. I will not allow such blasphemy â€” even if I must use force to prevent it."
"If I go down and she messes with my corpse, someone better knock her one in the jaw!"
